It was a site-wide bug not applying some minimum order price for shipping. She asked me if I’d be generous enough to retroactively pay shipping on an item that was already heading my way. I chose not to, as I fail to see how their oversight is my problem. I wouldn’t have bought their $10 wire if they wanted the $7 shipping in the first place. I’ve never heard of an online seller making an error and having the gall to call the customer and quite literally beg for money.

Review.Titre: The CB SHOP is Poor To Work With
Review.Contenu: I paid EXTRA for a CB to enhanced.  The radio does not work, at all.  I have went to (2) local CB shops thinking that I was an idiot.  I have a Workman SWR meter and the SWR is under 1.5 on Channel 40 and on Channel 1.  This is NOT rocket science and the (2) shops confirmed with HIGH END electronic SWR meters that my SWR is very low.  I had done a great job.I subsequently paid 50.00 to have the system gone through, and it was determined that it is the radio.  The radio sends ands receives UNDER 1/2 mile.  It is GARBAGE.  I never received a receipt and when I contacted Uniden, without a receipt they will not look at it under warranty.  Also, the amount freight was exuberant.  If you are going to sell products at low margins, do not kill the freight to make up for a poor business model.I said something about the freight and whomever at the CB shop fired back a rude and condescending response.  I ship products for a living.  The box I received was under 20# and the antenna was not in the Wilson packaging.  If the CB shop paid 80.00+ to ship that from Oregon to Arizona, then they are NOT very intelligent.  I ship speakers, all north of 40# in larger boxes.  For me to pay 80.00 as I was rudely informed by the CB shop, it would be OVER 100# and be going from AZ to the NE USA.  The only way to fix this is to send me a radio that works and that is what I paid EXTRA for, or to refund everything.  There is no discussion.Today is 10/21/2022 - in 1 week if I have not heard back I will protest the charges with the credit card company and get it back that way.***EDIT #1:  I have to edit my response because I cannot respond to that futile attempt of justification.  I was -1- count'em 1 day outside this "30 day" window.  You have been nothing but RUDE and condescending this entire time.  I have e-mailed you.  You now have 6 days to conform or I will win on the chargeback and that WILL cost you more money.

I think these people are probably decent but if you have any kind of a defect or an issue with the item you buy from them they’re only Remedy is pay you back or send it to the manufacture. I’ve never done any kind of business with anybody like this and never plan on doing any business with anybody like this again.And in response the radio doesn’t even turn on it won’t power up at all.You would think that you would probably do some kind of a check to make sure you’re not selling faulty equipment I ordered a 955 (from a different supplier) and have no problems with it at all whatsoever the antennas I ordered are great!

Purchased a ProComm RG8X coax with both 259 connectors attached.  Connected it up to my Cobra 29LX.  Worked well in testing (low SWR) After a day or two started getting some random antenna warnings.  It was off and on.  Thought the stud was the problem so I changed it out.  Worked for a bit then back to antenna warning.  Very frustrating.  Then heard a "Pop" on the radio and then I couldn't transmit.  After some investigation found out the 259 connection wasn't constructed correctly and if the coax moved a bit it would short out.  Finally got ahold of CB World and although they were apologetic, they haven't done anything about my damaged radio.Update:  Here is an idea. . .How about standing behind your products??? . . . For those of you that want to heed CB worlds advice just be advised that it may take days to hear back from them.

Cobra 18WXSTII. I will try and be brief, but overall, I am very dissatisfied with CB World in general. I ordered the Cobra radio mostly because of it’s reputation of being a well structured and reliable radio, but also because I like the scan feature advertised.My first order of the radio (77235) arrived and after installing it, I was not able to squelch out the noise using the squelch knob. After contacting CB WORLD Sales sales department, I was told that a return of the radio would be authorized. I asked if I could just get a replacement and was told no, that I would have to purchase a second radio and return the first one. Although I thought this was a strange way to conduct business, I agreed. When I was purchasing the second radio, I was asked if I wanted a technician to go through it to make sure everything worked. When I said yes, I was told there was a $25 fee to check the radio. Again, I thought this was strange, but needed the radio for an upcoming trip and made the order.I received an email with the return authorization information but found out that CB World does not provide a return shipping label and that the expense would lie with me. Frustrated, I mailed the defective radio to CB World on Friday 9-9-22. That was $15 out of pocket to return the defective radio.On 9-12-22 I received the second identical radio (order # 7732) and immediately installed it. While unpackaging the radio, I located a hand written note taped to the radio that read in part “ Talk with this Cobra Mic one inch or less from your lips. Set the dynamic control to 12 O’clock. If you are too loud, turn it down a little…….”The problem with that is, there is no dynamic mic control on this radio. As we started our trip, I connected with our traveling friends via CB and learned that I was over modulated and they could not understand what I was saying. Also, I was not able to squelch out All the noise, but only part of it making the trip extremely annoying and the CB pretty much useless. Along the way, I found a new Mic at a truck stop and switched it out with the Cobra Mic and found that I was now crystal clear.The first radio cost $84.90 and a return fee of $15.The second radio cost $109.99 and was still inoperable. My replacement Mic cost $21.99After contacting CB WORLD a second time regarding the microphone, I was basically blown off and offered no help.In my opinion, that is not the way to attract business or future customers.

I ordered a mic cord.  $5 for the cord, $7 shipping.  It arrived in good time.  I connected it to the mic and put the connector on the other end.  Radio keyed up when I plugged it in without depressing the PTT bar.  I checked the connections, all good.  Took the cord off and checked for shorts and such.  Some wires were shorted and others were open.  I let CB WORLD know of the problem.  They told me the had never had a bad one and would not authorize a return.  Told me to keep the cord and they would refund the $5 for the cord.  If I had sold a bad cord, I would want to see it.  So I paid $7 for shipping and have to toss out the cord.  Actually, $7 is cheap for the education I received.  Nice doing business with ya CB WORLD.  It wont happen again!!

2015 Tacoma1) AUGML-3 fender mount - Well made, fit well. Will not handle a 5' Firestick w/ spring. Too much flexing and waving. The pick up body will crack.2) Firestick SS3H spring- well made, fit well. Will not handle a 5' Firestick antenna (as advertised on the website). Too weak, needs to be much stronger. Will not handle freeway speed.3) 18' weatherproof coax- very good, would buy again.

I ordered a CB power cord, with plug and fuse.  It arrived quickly, which is good. But it wasn't exactly like the picture represented on the web-site, and the plug wasn't shaped the same as the receiving connector on the CB.  It works if I force the plug on but it doesn't seem right. It powered up the CB though so I'll keep the power cord.

I purchased a cb antenna along with the matched magnetic base for this antenna that was recommended by CB WORLD in an article that they had in their help section. After installing this setup my swr readings were very high. And this was checked with an MFJ digital SWR/POWER METER. CB WORLD had me pay for the return shipping which was over $20. which they should have absorbed. They recommended this product and it was defective. I could have damaged my radio if I used it. This was wrong and I will not deal with this company again.

Review.Titre: Antenna does not stay in place
Review.Contenu: The item ordered arrived and immediately noticed the plastic portion that inserts into the back of the scanner was not sized properly to keep the antenna upright. I believe the hole was too large allowing the metal portion to rotate, thus falling over.

I ordered a mounting bracket,  but was a little disappointed that the mounting screws weren't included. Not a huge deal, but an added expense, and drive to home depot. Shipping was quick, but almost as much as the bracket itself, I don't blame cb world for that though. Installed product fitment was perfect.

Review.Titre: The items were shipped fast BUT...
Review.Contenu: The items were shipped fast BUT...I was overcharged for shipping: the items cost over $10 to ship (a single item was $3, and small), and were shipped together in one envelope. It's an easy way to make more profit, but a lousy way to motivate a customer to stop back for more. I'll look at the website next time I need something, but I don't trust CB World very much now, so I'll be VERY CAREFUL when buying from them from now on. Amazon has this stuff too, and as much as I dislike enriching them, I'd rather do that than spend over $10 for envelope shipping.

Review.Titre: Slow Shipping time and high shipping cost
Review.Contenu: Price of product was good. Charged me $15.50 shipping and they shipped via USPS first class mail, I know it does not cost that much to ship this method. If product was shipped Fedex or UPS, that would justify shipping cost and I would have received my time faster.

Review.Titre: I gave 3 stars because I have no issue…
Review.Contenu: I gave 3 stars because I have no issue with your products or your service. I do have issue with the fact that trying to find a PTT microphone for a regular CB radio deck ( Cobra 29 LX) type is at this point non existent! It would just seem that if the option was still built into the deck that finding the peripherals would be easier. As 'CB' world I would expect your company to find and offer this product. I am trying to install this on a motorcycle set up. I know others that will be looking for CB units for communications on our group rides. Please help if you can. Shoot, build them yourself. 😁. Thanks, Ron Schorr

I have purchased three radios from you counting this one and I think I may have finally found one that works.  The first two I purchased from you are worthless.  The first one never worked I tried three different antennas and it made no difference in my opinion it is junk,  the second one I purchased your employee failed to tell me that it was not a CB therefore when I installed it and tried to get it to work it wouldn't so I called your company and the employee I talked with this time told me it was not a CB it was just a radio and that led me to this purchase which I hope will be the last time I have to deal with your company.

Review.Titre: They were super helpful and friendly
Review.Contenu: They were super helpful and friendly. Unfortunately, the screws they sent, and we thought were the right size, weren't. It was too small an order to send back and fuss with. I would work with them again.
Packaging was perfect, product didn’t deliver desired swr readings. Nothing Lower that 2.4 on my meter. Would return product if it was worth my time.*Edit: would order from CB world again.

I was surprised at how long it took before I received the notification that my order shipped.  The website said my item was "in stock" and yet it was 2 or 3 days later that I received notice that it shipped.

Review.Titre: Very nice people to chat with and they…
Review.Contenu: Very nice people to chat with and they understand my needs. Now i'm waiting for my credit card to be credited. I sent something back that I can't use and can't make work with my equipment.

Review.Titre: The shopping experience was pleasant but
Review.Contenu: The shopping experience was pleasant and speedy the product was not  good quality bought a cobra handheld CB and it destroys batteries and started corroding The batteries before I even had it for a week

Review.Titre: Tried 2 times trying to make a purchase…
Review.Contenu: Tried 2 times trying to make a purchase online and was declined. CB World noticed there was a problem and called me, tried purchasing over the phone 1 time and was declined and my credit card was deactivated. Called bank to reactivate and put CB World on conference call to confirm purchase and CB Worlds "New" system wouldnt take my money. Spent over an hour on the phone trying to make this purchase and finally went through. You think they would compensate you for the troubles on their end 🤔, the lady manager really didn't want to do anything and was lucky to even get a 3 day shipment. All I was asking for was a overnight shipment for troubles, and they waited 2 days to ship after I hung up. I dont think I'd purchase from here again. But i am happy with the product though.

Review.Titre: Good product overall, just missing a few things
Review.Contenu: The instructions were incomplete. It was missing picture number 5. Also bolt that was included for install was too short. Will have to find a bolt that is just a little bit longer.

It’s disappointing they don’t have a retail store. I live in Albany and learned of that on November 14 when I went to their location.  Two days later, I should receive my order placed online.  Looking at tracking, the shipping label was created on the 14th, picked up by USPS on the 15th, sent to Portland, then to Salem, and is now back in Albany for delivery today (maybe). I only live 10-15 minutes away. I would rather have just picked it up on the 14th but that wasn’t an option, unless the website just isn’t clear on how that can be done. Final result is $11+ to have my item shipped from Albany, to Portland and back again which is a bit steep for gross inefficiency.  I try to shop locally when I can but could have ordered from an off-road shop in Georgia and had it just as quickly.

Review.Titre: Most of everything I receved was ok.
Review.Contenu: Quality is ok so C-, value gets a A+, delivery speed gets a F. Ordered Friday night and took till the next Friday, I was watching my package and I believe it was at the facility  (where it gets put on a truck for delivery) on Wednesday and the employes had there thumbs up there butts not doing anything to help me get my package any faster. Quality is marked low because the picture I saw on the website and what I received were different, the mount was suppose to come ready to instal but no one told me I had to waist my time soldering, but the lift and lay stud is cheep but not worth the money, I'm trying to see if I can get it switched out for a spring. Overall I give the whole company a C-, the only thing keeping it afloat is how cheep it was, but I would give it a D if it was not so cheep.
Need a more variety of cb side mount and trunk mount equipment for cars. Also need a better overview of cb wattage output and peak and tune,  repairs & upgrades.

Review.Titre: Was unresponsive, but got this taken care of...
Review.Contenu: I bought a Powered PA speaker a while ago now.  It was supposed to be a waterproof speaker, and ended up getting water in it.  I spoke with the owner, and he sent me a shipping label, but due to my job, was unable to get it shipped right away.  A couple weeks later tried to call, but now no one answered.  Once a week for 6 months I called this company and no one answered.  I finally went on the website and sent an email, asking what was going on, and if this company is still in business, because with all of the messages I have left, I hadn't gotten a response.  I still have a broken PA speaker, and have yet to receive a response.  The only reason why im writing this, because I was sent an email for a survey from WearCB today.   Update... Ken from CBWorld Contacted me and sent me another shipping label to return the speaker, and sent me a refund minus shipping.  Glad this finally got taken care of.

Review.Titre: I am not sure it provides better…
Review.Contenu: I am not sure it provides better recently that the one that came with the scanner.It’s a Whistler handheldThanks Mike taylor
Great speedy delivery, however quality of the product is extremely poor... Definitely not what was expected... Thanks for Great Service..

Review.Titre: This is first order from you
Review.Contenu: I can not give a review with just ordering a mounting bracket. Maybe if I order something else. Do not need anything at the moment.

Review.Titre: I thought the cables had one wire…
Review.Contenu: I thought the cables had one wire shielded and none were.  Useless to me.  Better product description needed.
You didn't calibrate my mic. in the peak and tune I paid $45 for. I should have gone with Amazon.
My order was received promptly. The service was good but product doesn't appear to work properly
Bought a couple coax cables that were represented by a picture that was not the same as item received.
Delivery was fast. the product ( sharp shooter mic) is great. But couldnt find batteries For it.
my antenna is 3 days late and counting, with no update and no idea on where it is
UNIT IS TOO SMALL.  I CANT SEE THE CONTROLS OR READ THE TINY INSTRUCTION BOOK.
Great customer service and fast shipping. Just got the part wrong.

I’ve always have gotten excellent and prompt service from CB World.  The prices could be a little more competitive with other stores like NAPA for instance where I’ve purchased some CB parts and radios.  Excellent info and videos though so that’s worth something.  Thank you.  GW
EVERYTHING IS VERY GOOD, ONLY THERE WERE CHARGES A LITTLE ILLOGICAL, OTHER COMPANIES SELL THE SAME PRODUCT AND DO NOT CHARGE BY TYPE OF BATTERIES BUT AFTER ALL GOOD...... ..
Overall customer support was good.  I was charged a restocking fee for my return but nowhere in purchasing my CB radio was there any mention of charging a restocking fee.  Little disappointed.

I bought the Uniden Beartracker 855 peaked and tuned.  I bought the extra window antenna  thinking it was the best for the scanner.  When I received my order the same antenna was in the box with the cb. I would have thought that they know what's in the box and saved me $20.00 by canceling the extra antenna I bought.  If not for that it would have been a 5 star review  !

Review.Titre: A lot better reception than my other…
Review.Contenu: A lot better reception than my other radio. Distance to receive not quite what i wanted but very reliable and i would recommend to others.
Satisfactory delivery time. Have not installed or used product so cannot review for its capabilities, etc.
CB World has great prices and usually stocks what I'm looking for.
I haven't had a new radio in a long time and this one works great

Review.Titre: CB World has good prices and a good…
Review.Contenu: CB World has good prices and a good selection but keep in mind this is an internet purchase. They do not answer their phone for question so emailing back and forth is the way of the world. Also if you have a problem they try to help you but then refer you to the original manufacturer. I would suggest doing a local radio shop if you have anything other than something within your own skill set. They are nice to deal with but nothing beats local.

Prompt service. Great customer service. People on the phone are GREAT to deal with. I ordered a 11 meter radio that was not in stock. They arranged to have my cc on file, and charged my card when the unit arrived in stock. Shipped the same day!! They even called to confirm I still wanted to conclude the transaction. Would recommend to anyone!! Will definitely be doing business with them again. 😎

Review.Titre: This CB antenna is well made and I…
Review.Contenu: This CB antenna is well made and I found it easy to install and tune.  I had to trim the length a little to get the SWR as low as recommended.  Not a problem.   It hasn't been on my pickup long so I don't know about longevity.  So far I have not had occasion to communicate with it although I have heard some traffic at times.  I use it during hunting season to communicate with log trucks that may be using the same roads.  It is best to stay out of their way if possible.

Review.Titre: Great product, but no instructions or after-purchase info.
Review.Contenu: Fits exactly as advertised, solid and professional looking mount. Lacked any kind of instructions, but if you've a modicum of mobile electronics experience it shouldn't be hard to figure out. Hell, I did. I was a little worried about the lack of order confirmation or tracking info etc, but it actually arrived earlier than expected, in less than a week. Fairly impressive, considering all the COVID delays that have become the new norm.Overall, well worth it for a 25 year old Jeep. :D

Service was acceptable.  I would shop there again if I needed more RCI-8719 PLL IC Chips. I trust CB World. I would shop somewhere else if the price was lower and the shipping rates were also lower and I trusted them as much as CB World with the quality of their inventory. There are a lot of fake electronic parts out there from China but CB World seems to have a good quality inventory.

Review.Titre: Experience with CB World was pretty good
Review.Contenu: Experience with CB World was pretty good, even though we had a misunderstanding  about what items came with my order,  sent them an email telling them about the issue, they called me back the next day and took care of the problem right way, so overall it was a good experience and recommend CB World for your CB Radio needs !

Review.Titre: I found the products I needed after a…
Review.Contenu: I found the products I needed after a brief search. I would like to see more details about items- I was looking for an antenna mount for a Wilson antenna and although I found a suitable mount, I did have to modify it to accept the antenna coil mount as although the mount was listed as being compatible with my antenna, aside from the diameter of the stud hole there were no other dimensions listed. The stud hole was actually too large for the base coil connector.

Review.Titre: Mariah was very helpful with my order
Review.Contenu: Mariah was very helpful with my order. New customer ordering hand held cb plus antenna, etc.She helped with suggestions on equipment for the purpose we are to use. Items arrived safe and sound, with one minor piece that was sent but was not ordered / wrong, company acknowledged error, apologizing and quickly sent correct piece out same day I received order, and the correct item came 1 day earlier than it was expected. Thanks Mariah!

You shipped in a timely fashion and used the United States postal service.And as always, the postal service provides pretty much provided their normal basic service and is late, as usual.It was supposed to arrive today and the message says it's late in transit.That's not your fault.

Review.Titre: Product was just what I was looking…
Review.Contenu: Product was just what I was looking for.  The speaker that is in the unit was not exactly what I expected.  The radio speaker works as good as it does.  Thought that it may have been louder.  That's what I get for assuming.  Overall the service and quality for the unit was great and on time.  I would recommend them to anyone.

I bought a PATRIOT and the matching ground plane kit, PAT12GPK.The antenna had instructions, but the ground plane didn't. I Emailed support, and while waiting for a response, I did more research, locating a sketch on their website. This shows the collar attached at the very top of the antenna's metal collar. Support did not have an instruction sheet, but agreed this should be the right place.  SWR is 1.2 :)An instruction sheet accompanying the ground plane, or available for download would've been better. Good antenna, would buy again.

The product's you sell like to see more pictures also run a Repair CB repair business Rick's CB Schoppe FCC Licensed been at it for years. Got sick now The VA got me back on my feet and I am looking parts supply and reasoned prices most of my supply's are coming from China Japan etc. look forward doing more business with you. TKS Rick

I appreciated the call back when I left a message! Thank you... everything was timely. I had to order more equipment (cable from unit to antenna). It would be helpful for future users to see an "everything you need" for the unit or "what others purchased with this" section to get everything done at one time.  Thanks for sending everything! Can't wait to install it!

Service was very quick and easy. Information online was a little shy of what could have been and I don't want to judge harshly cause It may have been an oversight on my part. The information on the product I purchased didn't let me know that the radio would not come already converted. So I spent the same on line as I would have at the cb shop. All is well though I have a great radio that does what I wanted it to do.

Great customer service.  Offering a peak and tune option on the radio is perfect.  The only criticism is to indicate when providing the tracking number is to include all tracking numbers when the order is split into more than one package. This lets the customer know it will not all be arriving at once.

Part received as ordered. Packaging was sufficient and remained intact.However I'm not a great fan of shipping by USPS.They rarely arrived on time. My order was a day late. Their subjected to be lost or delivered to wrong address quite often.and the tracking info leaves a lot to be even rate poor.I give you 4 stars for CB Worlds part and for the price of shipping I think you should select another shipper.

Their prices were very competitive with, and they offer great product knowledge. My only negative was their slow shipping times. It was free, but it certainly translated to slow. If you need your product in a hurry, but don't want to pay outrageous expedited delivery times look elsewhere. If product knowledge and fair prices are your main concern you've found a winner with CB World.

Very pleased with using web site to order.  Nice to see the offer to have the radio peak and tuned before I get it.  Back to using a CB after 30yrs, nice to have help with the new equipment.  Shippment on time and looking forward to installing the new Camo Cobra system into my Jeep.  Everything was available for my install, jeep mount, coax, quick release kit, spring kit and all.  Thanks CB World.

I ordered a magnetic mount antenna for my Midland model 75-822 handheld CB radio to use in the car. The CB World website recommended the ProComm Kwik Tune Magnet Mount CB Antenna and that I also purchase a AR3 - Firestik Adapter SO239 To BNC. Without thinking about it I went ahead and ordered one. But when using the Midland 75-822 in a car you use the adapter that allows you to power it from the cigarette lighter and the adapter also has a SO239 connecter for the antenna making the AR3 unnecessary. The AR3 only costs $6.57 but I would think that CB World would explain that you only need it if you are going to use the radio with battery power.

Haven't had any issues with any of the products shipped. They have all worked and been as advertised. If I could have one complaint, would be that it takes a full 24hrs to ship parts out. I ordered a whip and spring from this website at the same time I ordered an extendedicated CB stud and nut from another. The stud and nut arrived two rays ago, and this should arrive tomorrow. Other than that small "con" I have no issues

I purchased from CB World due to overall selection and price. I hoped for more description but I believe the items I bought will work fine. East order placement. I chose cheapest shipping and UPS is delivering later than stated 5 business days. Still waiting to see if items I receive are as ordered and work as planned, so I can't rate as 5 star at this point.

Very smooth process, from ordering, through shipment, to receipt.  Reasonable pricing too.  Be careful when ordering, as the CBWorld website appears to default to the state of Alabama when asking for your shipping address.  You must correct it manually.

Everything was done online.  I was notified my order was filled and shipped the same day with a tracking number. The product came on the day promised.  I had no interaction with the CB Shop staff. CB shop could have one of their staff send an e-mail asking for a review vice one computer generarted.  Overall great electronic service.

The ordering process was simple and efficient. Received my order in a timely manner. Everything arrived in perfect condition. Only reason I rated it a four is because I purchased a firestik magnetic base, based off the description of the product that said it was stout and would hold my length antenna. Turns out it won't hold over 50 mph on a solid metal surface. Disappointed a little was all. However I would still do business with CBWORLD in the future and refer any friends to do the same.

Review.Titre: CB hump mount w/ ext. speaker drink holders.
Review.Contenu: The item above would've rated five stars had it not been for the wires for the speaker just falling off. luckily I am handy with a soldering iron. Also in my 07' Ram there was just barely room, I actually had to modify the set up somewhat. The item arrived on time and in good condition (except for the wires.).

Customer service was great. They found out from a dealership that the mounting bracket would not fit my truck as advertised, due to having a different hood than the standard Silverado's. They called me back to inform me personally. You can't get much better service than that....

Bought a Galaxy 494 SSB. Shipped fast with no damage. Paid for peak and tune, didn't get anything stating that the peak and tune was done so I'm not sure if it was. I just like to have documentation of stuff since I paid extra for the service.

Review.Titre: Great company prompt answering of the…
Review.Contenu: Great company prompt answering of the phone.  But, I ordered a microphone tester that was bad out of the box, UN-usable. They did exchange it for a new one but I had to pay the return shipping and the faulty product was not my fault. Other wise great to deal with.

Great experience with one exception. Would have been five stars except no notification of any kind even after calling and leaving a message. Package did show up on time though :-) exactly what I ordered and a higher quality than expected

Review.Titre: It was refreshing to be able to speak…
Review.Contenu: It was refreshing to be able to speak with someone in your distribution center who knew CB Radios. I have been looking for a company to help out with our fleet and I think I have found it.The prices and availability in the retail store completed the package.Thank You!

Review.Titre: The items arrived timely but with one problem!!
Review.Contenu: My items arrived on time and packaged well. The only thing is one item I ordered was broken and I am still waiting for a response from CB world in replacing the item. Hopefully the customer service is good. Besides that everything I ordered is fine. I still would order from them again.

The service of getting the part to me was excellent, however the fit of the antenna mount wasn't as good as expected. The mount was installed on my 2010 F150, but I had to remove it and make several adjustments so that the mount didn't rub against the hood.

got good response when ordered received in timely mannerNOW I Have To Find a Company That ill Sell Me Just Antenna FIRESTIK FG4 Red As I Have To Change Mounting Location as had side window awning installed and was put where original mount was going to be located

Radio works just fine, a tracking number would have been nice as my radio was sitting on my front porch like I said a tracking number. Other than that alz good,  although they sold me a refurbished 890 and sold it as new...

Review.Titre: Kalibur Dynamic Replacement Microphone for Midland 4-Pin Sets
Review.Contenu: I bought a replacement microphone for my older Midland CB with 4-pin connector. Unfortunately, the microphone did not work. I had saved the old microphone so I was able to use it to determine the correct pinout. Both the transmit and receive circuits were connected to the wrong pins. After re-wiring the connector, the microphone works very well with great sound quality and full modulation. Someone else probably would have just returned it and said that it was defective, but since I'm an electrical engineer I thought I could make it work. Considering the price paid, it was an excellent value and I'm happy with my purchase. Shipping charges were a bit high though.

Everything needed to get up and running. Great website, was able to find what was needed plus what else was needed to finish installation. Everything thing shipped and had in 3-5 days.Thanks Great product and education !

Review.Titre: Very helpful once you can get ahold of…
Review.Contenu: Very helpful once you can get ahold of them. Do not seem to answer phones. Sent an email and was called back within 5 minutes. They were right on top of shipping and radio guy it the next afternoon to peak and tune.

Review.Titre: I can only say "AWESOME EXPERANCE" to …
Review.Contenu: I can only say "AWESOME EXPERANCE" to have Sunan take my call. I tried my best to describe my dilemma, but lacked the technical words to explains the connection problem I was having. She took her time, very calmly asking questions as I struggled to understand the language of connectors. She had me type in the numbers on the web page to get pictures so I could confirm the item was correct. She put two connectors together to solve my problem. So I only had to plug everything together and my problem was solved. I had been to Best Buy and the " Geeks" couldn't help me at all. Susan get a A+ in my book.

Yor service ws out standing. I had a problem navigating Yor purchase site...i had inadvertently ordrd 3 portable CBs  not 1❗️Yor service representative cleard all that up and completed my purchase with me. I'm a Happy Camper❗️😁

All was as expected. Product arrived in timely manner. The only complaint is that my PL-259 connector arrived in a box big enough to hold a 6 pack of beer! An envelope would have worked just fine and cost much less.  That said, I will order again.

Review.Titre: Great site for all your CB needs
Review.Contenu: Great site they have tons of stuff for your cb or ham radio needs. I would of gave 5 stars but since they can’t find the right mount for my 18 Silverado, this will have to do for now.

Review.Contenu: I would have given a 5 had you shipped somewhere other than usps. Just had 2 orders delayed , one 17 days another 8 days , order from you 2 days . I order stuff I need , not to watch it sit for 3 days at a local P.O. .

Review.Titre: lots of product to choose from
Review.Contenu: lots of product to choose from and the prices were very good along with the shipping costs. the on line order was easy and I had my order is a couple of days. I would sure order from CB World again if the need arises.

Review.Contenu: Shipping was quick and product arrived, as requested. Installed radio but have not had time to tune antenna, etc., so can't comment on quality or features built into radio.

Review.Titre: Package received it in good shape and…
Review.Contenu: Package received it in good shape and on time, I think. It would be nice to have tracking information provided on shipment. I can’t rate the radio at this time becuase it has not been used.

Review.Titre: Part was correct and fixed my uniden…

everything was as stated BUT stay away from shakespear centerpin connector modelpl259cp It DOES N OT work at all, tried several times, guess it does not make contact with center pin !!!!!!
Good selection and prices. Prompt Shipping.  Abundant communication and updates regarding your orders process.  Ordered from here before and will continue to do so in the future.

Review.Titre: Would like to see more shipping options…

Review.Titre: Overall the service was efficient and timely. No back Orders!

Review.Titre: I got my antenna for my CB very quick…

Review.Titre: The website is functional but extremely…
